content.question: Which visual elements in Jaune Quick-to-See Smithâ€™s Trade (Gifts for Trading Land with White People) contribute most to emotional expressiveness of the painting?

choices.label: the gestural painting style and visible drips of red pigment
the central placement and illusionistic rendering of the canoe
the strong vertical emphasis and the three-panel triptych format
the mass-produced imagery and inclusion of found objects

content.answer: the gestural painting style and visible drips of red pigment

topic.text: 10.1: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in Global Contemporary Art

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, technique, and/or content shape a work of art (or group of related works of art).
